tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CodeFrequency (
    code_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_id INT,
    researcher_id INT,
    code_text VARCHAR(50),
    frequency INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (data_id) REFERENCES QualitativeData(data_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ResearchData (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT NOT NULL,
  code_id INT NOT NULL,
  frequency INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES CodingProjects(project_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (code_id) REFERENCES CodeFrequencies(code_id)
);
